testimonial1: I found my ideal home in no time! The listings were detailed, the photos were accurate, and the whole process felt seamless. Customer service was top-notch, answering all my questions. I will definitely use this platform again in the future!

heroSection.title: Discover a realm of luxury and sophistication

faq.title: All about Amazing Farms
faq.description: We know that buying, selling, or investing in real estate can be overwhelming. Here are some frequently asked questions to help guide you through the process

item1.question: 1. Can I customize my estate?
item1.answer: Absolutely! We offer a range of customization options to make your estate truly yours.

item2.question: 2. Where can I find estates?
item2.answer: You can find our estates listed on our website, complete with detailed descriptions and photos.

item3.question: 3. What steps to buy an estate?
item3.answer: To buy an estate, start by browsing our listings online. Once you find a property you like, contact our sales team to schedule a viewing. After that, you can make an offer, and if accepted, proceed with the necessary paperwork and financing options.

investors.title: üåé Ecuador: Living at the Center of the Planet

description.name: Ecuador is located exactly on the equator, giving it an exceptional climate year-round. Thanks to its privileged location, it offers a unique diversity of environments:
description.point1: Tropical, ideal for those who enjoy the sun and the beach
description.point2: Subtropical, with pleasant temperatures and green landscapes
description.point3: Humid, with lush vegetation and nature
description.point4: Dry, perfect for warm and stable climates

investors.description1: This variety of climates and ecosystems makes the country an ideal place to live, invest, and enjoy. Ecuador not only offers natural beauty and quality of life, but also attractive real estate opportunities, with properties in urban, rural, and tourist areas to suit any lifestyle.
investors.title1: Investing in Ecuador means choosing a country with a privileged climate, unique diversity, and a future full of possibilities.

property.title: Discover the properties of incredible extensions.
property.description: Experience elegance and comfort with our exclusive luxury estates, designed for sophisticated living.

jubiladosForm.reason1:
üá™üá® 1. Affordable cost of living
Compared to many countries in the Americas and Europe, living in Ecuador is usually more affordable.
Cheaper housing
Low-priced services and transportation
Fresh and inexpensive food (especially in markets)
jubiladosForm.reason2:
üåé 2. Natural diversity in a small area
In just a few hours you can go from the coast to the Andean highlands, the Amazon rainforest, or the Galapagos Islands.
Beaches
Mountains and volcanoes
Rainforest
Modern cities
jubiladosForm.reason3:
üå°Ô∏è 3. Climates for all tastes
Since Ecuador is on the equator, there are no distinct seasons.
If you want heat: coast and Amazon
If you prefer a temperate climate: Andes
You can always choose a climate that suits you.
jubiladosForm.reason4:
‚ù§Ô∏è 4. Friendly people and a relaxed lifestyle
Most people value:
The friendliness and warmth
The community life
A slower pace of life than in other countries
jubiladosForm.reason5:
üè• 5. Affordable healthcare
There are inexpensive public hospitals and good quality private clinics at lower prices than in the US or Europe.
jubiladosForm.reason6:
üíµ 6. US dollar as currency
This attracts many people because of the economic stability and because sharp devaluations are avoided.
jubiladosForm.reason7:
üß≥ 7. Facilities for foreigners
Ecuador offers various residency visas:
Retiree visa
Investment visa
Work visa
Digital nomad visa (temporary resident for teleworking)
jubiladosForm.reason8:
ü•ë 8. Fresh and varied food
The The country produces fruits, vegetables, and seafood year-round. It's easy to eat healthy and fresh.
jubiladosForm.reason9:
üèõÔ∏è 9. Rich and varied culture
Indigenous traditions
Mestizo influences
Colorful festivals

actividadesForm.title: ACTIVITIES IN ECUADOR
actividadesForm.description: Ecuador offers experiences for all types of travelers: nature, adventure, culture, gastronomy, and relaxation. Here are some of the most popular activities:

activity1.name: üåã 1. Adventure and Nature
activity1.act1: Trekking to Quilotoa (volcanic crater with turquoise lagoon)
activity1.act2: Climbing Cotopaxi or hiking in Cotopaxi National Park
activity1.act3: Visiting Chimborazo (the closest point to the sun)
activity1.act4: Diving and snorkeling in the Galapagos Islands
activity1.act5: Canopy tours and rafting in Ba√±os de Agua Santa
activity1.act8: Trekking in El Altar and Sangay National Parks

activity2.name: üèôÔ∏è 2. Culture and Cities
activity2.act1: Explore the Historic Center of Quito (UNESCO World Heritage Site)
activity2.act2: Visit Cuenca and its colonial churches
activity2.act3: Stroll along the Malec√≥n 2000 in Guayaquil
activity2.act4: Explore La Ronda and Mitad del Mundo

activity3.name: üèñÔ∏è 3. Beaches and Coast
activity3.act3: Los Frailes (one of the best beaches in the country)
activity3.act5: Puerto L√≥pez (whale watching in June) as of September)

activity4.name: üåø 4. Amazon Rainforest
activity4.act4: Canoe trips, caiman and pink dolphin watching

activity6.name: ‚ù§Ô∏è 6. Unique Experiences
activity6.act2: Crossing the Devil's Nose Train (Riobamba ‚Äì Alaus√≠)
activity6.act4: Walking on Suspension Bridges in Mindo
activity6.act5: Coffee and Chocolate Tours on the Coast and Amazon
activity6.act6: Visiting Indigenous Communities in Otavalo and Saraguro

activity7.name: üõí 7. Markets and Handicrafts
activity7.act1: Otavalo Market (one of the largest in South America)
activity7.act4: Local products: cacao, coffee, ceramics, textiles
